refnamediv.refpurpose: sets a limit of heavy weapons that can be used at once per team

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: g_heavyWeaponRestriction sets a limit of heavy weapons that can be used at once per team based on the number of players on the team. For each type of heavy weapon, a team can have only the specified percentage of the team's total players using that weapon.
